attributes.action: Stop The Harrassment and Bullying Against Ex- Partners
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To stop the Harrassment and Bullying from Ex-partners. Difference with this one, over time after each event is recorded, only then can they be dealt with, to stop the stress of the children too caught up in the middle and is deeply affected and to protect the 'Lone family' from stress. To make the Break up easier for both.

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Statements that don't actually request any action
Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
